articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Pulse to proactively write you morning briefs - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pulse is part of a broader shift in OpenAI's consumer products, which are lately being designed to work for users asynchronously instead of responding to questions.
articles.content: OpenAI is launching a new feature inside of ChatGPT called Pulse, which generates personalized reports for users while they sleep. Pulse offers users five to 10 briefs that can get them up to speed o… [+4501 chars]

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Amazon to pay $2.5B in FTC settlement over ‘deceptive’ Prime tactics - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company will be required to pay a $1 billion civil penalty and provide $1.5 billion in refunds back to an estimated 35 million consumers harmed by the company's "deceptive Prime enrollment practices," the FTC says.
articles.content: Amazon has agreed to pay $2.5 billion to settle a lawsuit from the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) over allegations that it duped users into paying for Prime subscriptions and made it hard to cancel m… [+2652 chars]

articles.author: Robert Pearlman
articles.title: The crew of Artemis II will fly on Integrity during mission to the Moon - Ars Technica
articles.description: The first astronauts set to fly to the moon in more than 50 years will do so in Integrity.
